sentence.Network_en: At first, he was blissfully unaware of the conspiracy against him.
sentence.Network_cn: 起初，他幸好不知道那些针对他的阴谋。

entry.def: A blissful situation or period of time is one in which you are extremely happy.

example.ex: We spent a blissful week together...
example.tran: 我们一起度过了非常快乐的一周。

example.ex: There's just nothing more blissful than lying by that pool.
example.tran: 没有比躺在那个泳池边更惬意的事情了。

entry.tran: （对不好或严重的事情）丝毫没有察觉的，毫不知情的
entry.def: If someone is in blissful ignorance of something unpleasant or serious, they are totally unaware of it.

example.ex: Many country parishes were still living in blissful ignorance of the post-war crime wave.
example.tran: 庆幸的是，许多乡村教区仍然没有感受到战后的犯罪浪潮。

sentences.sentence: "he was blissfully unaware of the danger"
